name: McDonald's
description: McDonald's is the most popular fast food chain in the United States, serving burgers, chicken sandwiches, and chicken nuggets.

name: Chick-fil-A
description: Chick-fil-A is a popular fast food chain known for their chicken sandwiches, salads, and chicken strips.

name: Chipotle
description: Chipotle is the most popular Mexican-American fast food chain, serving burritos, tacos, and burrito bowls.

name: In-N-Out
description: In-N-Out is a popular burger chain known for its high-quality burgers, with locations in limited states.

name: Five Guys
description: Five Guys is a burger spot that serves burgers, hotdogs, and fries, known for high-quality food but at a slightly higher price.

name: Wingstop
description: Wingstop is known as the best wing spot in the States, serving chicken wings with various flavors.
